A variation of the Tsukuyomi used by [[Nanashi Uchiha]]. By reflecting the light of her Sharingan off of the [[moon]], similarly to the [[Infinite Tsukuyomi]], the user is able to brand all those caught in the light of their eyes with a blemish in the shape of their [[Mangekyō Sharingan]]. This allows her to prepare for a mass usage of [[Yachihoko]].

== Trivia ==
* The Engraved Tsukuyomi was referred to as the [[Infinite Tsukuyomi]] by [[Sasuke Uchiha]] and others, before Nanashi gave it its name.

[[pt-br:Tsukuyomi Entalhado]]
[[pl:Inkizami no Tsukuyomi]]
